statements: DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 101 AND maintenance_type = 'Preventive';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE maintenance_id = 205 AND maintenance_date < '2022-09-15';
DELETE FROM Maintenance_History WHERE maintenance_type = 'Major Check' AND maintenance_cost > 500.00

DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE equipment_id = 2 AND status = 'scheduled';
DELETE FROM MaintenanceSchedule WHERE schedule_id > 100 AND status = 'Completed';
DELETE FROM Maintenance_History WHERE equipment_id = 100 AND maintenance_date < '2022-01-01';
